column4: Hi. I have found that I am not a big fan of XFCE KDE or GNOME but I love Ubuntu.  Other than Fluxbox are there any decent desktop environs?
is icewm really lighter than xfce ?
You can have a standalone session. You probably want some window manager and maybe a taskbar at least
Basically, you startx without any other programs loaded and load only what you want to load
